history.proof: intros l xs ys H. induction H. - shelve. - constructor. apply IHIR_equivalent. - apply IR_equiv_move. apply IHIR_equivalent. shelve. - apply IR_equiv_trans with (l2 := l ++ l); auto. + shelve. + shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
K: Type
K_eq_dec: forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y}

Goal:
forall l xs ys : list IR, IR_equivalent xs ys -> IR_equivalent (xs ++ l) (ys ++ l)

Premises:
Inductive IR_equivalent : list IR -> list IR -> Prop := IR_equiv_nil : IR_equivalent [] [] | IR_equiv_cons : forall (x : IR) (xs ys : list IR), IR_equivalent xs ys -> IR_equivalent (x :: xs) (x :: ys) | IR_equiv_move : forall (x y : IR) (xs ys : list IR), IR_equivalent xs ys -> good_move x y -> IR_equivalent (x :: y :: xs) (y :: x :: ys) | IR_equiv_trans : forall l1 l2 l3 : list IR, IR_equivalent l1 l2 -> IR_equivalent l2 l3 -> IR_equivalent l1 l3 Arguments IR_equivalent (_ _)%list_scope Arguments IR_equiv_cons _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments IR_equiv_move _ _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments IR_equiv_trans (_ _ _)%list_scope
Inductive IR : Type := IRI : K -> IR | IRO : K -> IR | IRU : K -> IR
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
IR_equiv_snoc : forall (xs ys : list IR) (x : IR), IR_equivalent xs ys -> IR_equivalent (xs ++ [x]) (ys ++ [x])
IR_equiv_app_head : forall l xs ys : list IR, IR_equivalent xs ys -> IR_equivalent (l ++ xs) (l ++ ys)
IR_equivalent_sind : forall P : list IR -> list IR -> SProp, P [] [] -> (forall (x : IR) (xs ys : list IR), IR_equivalent xs ys -> P xs ys -> P (x :: xs) (x :: ys)) -> (forall (x y : IR) (xs ys : list IR), IR_equivalent xs ys -> P xs ys -> good_move x y -> P (x :: y :: xs) (y :: x :: ys)) -> (forall l1 l2 l3 : list IR, IR_equivalent l1 l2 -> P l1 l2 -> IR_equivalent l2 l3 -> P l2 l3 -> P l1 l3) -> forall l l0 : list IR, IR_equivalent l l0 -> P l l0
IR_equivalent_ind : forall P : list IR -> list IR -> Prop, P [] [] -> (forall (x : IR) (xs ys : list IR), IR_equivalent xs ys -> P xs ys -> P (x :: xs) (x :: ys)) -> (forall (x y : IR) (xs ys : list IR), IR_equivalent xs ys -> P xs ys -> good_move x y -> P (x :: y :: xs) (y :: x :: ys)) -> (forall l1 l2 l3 : list IR, IR_equivalent l1 l2 -> P l1 l2 -> IR_equivalent l2 l3 -> P l2 l3 -> P l1 l3) -> forall l l0 : list IR, IR_equivalent l l0 -> P l l0
remove_all_app_r : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (xs ys zs : list A), remove_all A_eq_dec xs (ys ++ zs) = remove_all A_eq_dec xs ys ++ remove_all A_eq_dec xs zs
Inductive IR_equivalent : list IR -> list IR -> Prop := IR_equiv_nil : IR_equivalent [] [] | IR_equiv_cons : forall (x : IR) (xs ys : list IR), IR_equivalent xs ys -> IR_equivalent (x :: xs) (x :: ys) | IR_equiv_move : forall (x y : IR) (xs ys : list IR), IR_equivalent xs ys -> good_move x y -> IR_equivalent (x :: y :: xs) (y :: x :: ys) | IR_equiv_trans : forall l1 l2 l3 : list IR, IR_equivalent l1 l2 -> IR_equivalent l2 l3 -> IR_equivalent l1 l3 Arguments IR_equivalent (_ _)%list_scope Arguments IR_equiv_cons _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments IR_equiv_move _ _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments IR_equiv_trans (_ _ _)%list_scope
dedup_app : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (xs ys : list A), (forall x y : A, In x xs -> In y ys -> x <> y) -> dedup A_eq_dec (xs ++ ys) = dedup A_eq_dec xs ++ dedup A_eq_dec ys
IR_equiv_move : forall (x y : IR) (xs ys : list IR), IR_equivalent xs ys -> good_move x y -> IR_equivalent (x :: y :: xs) (y :: x :: ys)
IR_equiv_cons : forall (x : IR) (xs ys : list IR), IR_equivalent xs ys -> IR_equivalent (x :: xs) (x :: ys)
remove_app_comm : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (a : A) (xs ys : list A), remove A_eq_dec a (xs ++ ys) = remove A_eq_dec a xs ++ remove A_eq_dec a ys
remove_all_app_l : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (xs ys zs : list A), remove_all A_eq_dec (xs ++ ys) zs = remove_all A_eq_dec xs (remove_all A_eq_dec ys zs)
remove_all_cons : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (ys : list A) (a : A) (l : list A), remove_all A_eq_dec ys (a :: l) = remove_all A_eq_dec ys l /\ In a ys \/ remove_all A_eq_dec ys (a :: l) = a :: remove_all A_eq_dec ys l /\ ~ In a ys
subset_length : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall xs ys : list A, NoDup xs -> (forall x : A, In x xs -> In x ys) -> length ys >= length xs
before_remove_all_if : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x y : A) (l xs : list A), before x y l -> ~ In x xs -> before x y (remove_all A_eq_dec xs l)
subseq_trans : forall (A : Type) (zs xs ys : list A), subseq xs ys -> subseq ys zs -> subseq xs zs
dedup_partition : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (xs : list A) (p : A) (ys xs' ys' : list A), dedup A_eq_dec (xs ++ p :: ys) = xs' ++ p :: ys' -> remove A_eq_dec p (dedup A_eq_dec (xs ++ ys)) = xs' ++ ys'
remove_partition : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (xs : list A) (p : A) (ys : list A), remove A_eq_dec p (xs ++ p :: ys) = remove A_eq_dec p (xs ++ ys)
dedup_NoDup_id : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (xs : list A), NoDup xs -> dedup A_eq_dec xs = xs
remove_all_nil : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (ys : list A), remove_all A_eq_dec ys [] = []
filter_dedup : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (pred : A -> bool) (xs : list A) (p : A) (ys : list A), pred p = false -> filter pred (dedup A_eq_dec (xs ++ ys)) = filter pred (dedup A_eq_dec (xs ++ p :: ys))
remove_not_in : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x : A) (xs : list A), ~ In x xs -> remove A_eq_dec x xs = xs
remove_length_in : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x : A) (xs : list A), In x xs -> NoDup xs -> S (length (remove A_eq_dec x xs)) = length xs
IR_equiv_trans : forall l1 l2 l3 : list IR, IR_equivalent l1 l2 -> IR_equivalent l2 l3 -> IR_equivalent l1 l3
remove_length_not_in : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x : A) (xs : list A), ~ In x xs -> length (remove A_eq_dec x xs) = length xs
IR_equivalent_refl : forall l : list IR, IR_equivalent l l
remove_length_ge : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x : A) (xs : list A), NoDup xs -> length (remove A_eq_dec x xs) >= length xs - 1
filter_except_one : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (f g : A -> bool) (x : A) (xs : list A), (forall y : A, In y xs -> x <> y -> f y = g y) -> g x = false -> filter f (remove A_eq_dec x xs) = filter g xs
remove_preserve : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x y : A) (xs : list A), x <> y -> In y xs -> In y (remove A_eq_dec x xs)
in_remove : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x y : A) (xs : list A), In y (remove A_eq_dec x xs) -> In y xs
dedup_In : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x : A) (xs : list A), In x xs -> In x (dedup A_eq_dec xs)
in_dedup_was_in : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (xs : list A) (x : A), In x (dedup A_eq_dec xs) -> In x xs
remove_NoDup : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x : A) (xs : list A), NoDup xs -> NoDup (remove A_eq_dec x xs)
IR_equiv_in_l_r : forall ir1 ir2 : list IR, IR_equivalent ir1 ir2 -> forall o : IR, In o ir1 -> In o ir2
IR_equiv_in_r_l : forall ir1 ir2 : list IR, IR_equivalent ir1 ir2 -> forall o : IR, In o ir2 -> In o ir1
remove_length_lt : forall (A : Type) (x : A) (xs : list A) (eq_dec : forall x0 y : A, {x0 = y} + {x0 <> y}), In x xs -> length xs > length (remove eq_dec x xs)
subseq_remove : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x : A) (xs : list A), subseq (remove A_eq_dec x xs) xs
IR_equiv_Permutation : forall ir1 ir2 : list IR, IR_equivalent ir1 ir2 -> Permutation ir1 ir2
in_remove_all_was_in : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (ds l : list A) (x : A), In x (remove_all A_eq_dec ds l) -> In x l
count_occ_cons_neq : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A) (x y : A), x <> y -> count_occ eq_dec (x :: l) y = count_occ eq_dec l y
count_occ_cons_eq : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A) (x y : A), x = y -> count_occ eq_dec (x :: l) y = S (count_occ eq_dec l y)

```  
intros l xs ys H.
induction H.
- constructor.
- constructor. apply IHIR_equivalent.
- apply IR_equiv_move. apply IHIR_equivalent.
- apply IR_equiv_trans with (l2 := ys ++ l); auto.
```

original: intros l xs ys H. induction H. - constructor. - constructor. apply IHIR_equivalent. - apply IR_equiv_move. apply IHIR_equivalent. - apply IR_equiv_trans with (l2 := ys ++ l); auto.
